title: Executive Order 6324-Authorizing the Appointment of David H. Morton
content: David H. Morton may be appointed as personal secretary and law clerk in the United States Customs Court, New York, without reference to the requirements of the civil service rules. This action is desired by Judge Brown of the court.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6324-Authorizing the Appointment of David H. Morton Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362149
